pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package contains a collection of tools for reading, format shifting, and analyzing LWA data. It also contains the majority of the lwa_user library developed by NRL. The lwa_user modules includes (and their respective names in the LSL package are): * lwa_user.astro (lsl.astro) * lwa_user.catalog (lsl.catalog) * lwa_user.mathutil (lsl.misc.mathutil) * lwa_user.nec_util (lsl.sim.nec_util) * lwa_user.skymap (lsl.skymap) * lwa_user.transform (lsl.transform)
